entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
